Patients stratify accord ECOG performance status ( 0 1 v 2 ) . All patient receive gemcitabine IV 30-60 minute day 1 8 carboplatin IV 30-60 minute day 1 . Treatment repeat every 21 day 4 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients stable respond disease proceed docetaxel therapy . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I ( immediate docetaxel ) : Patients receive immediate docetaxel IV 1 hour day 1 . - Arm II ( delay docetaxel ) : Patients observe first evidence disease progression receive docetaxel IV 1 hour day 1 . In arm , treatment repeat every 3 week 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity .
